title: RIOT PLEASE HELP!
body:
**What was this about? I honestly can't remember making any comments in this regard, please help and clarify. Thanks**

RIOT GAMES
Your Content Has Been Removed
22 days ago
Your Content Has Been Removed
22 days ago
FROM: RIOT GAMES
We have removed your content due to a violation of the following board rule: Don't be a Jerk

We understand you didn't intentionally try to insult anyone, but what your comments are borderline offensive, so we've decided to burn it with fire. That said, we've decided not to issue any punishments this time because we don't think you were blatantly trying to offend anyone, but please be more careful in the future.

This message is intended as a warning. If you continue to violate board rules, you may be temporarily or permanently suspended from the boards. Please review the universal board rules here before posting in the future.

replies.body:
Are these e-mails being sent to you from Riot?

If that's the case, I'd say to review exactly what you're posting. If you're 100% sure they could not be interpretted in any sort of negative fashion, then it could be that your account has been compromised and that someone else is posting on your behalf.

If this happens again, submit a support ticket and inquire why.
How do I submit a support ticket?

There is a link immediately to the left of this message, but I'll also provide it here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new

Ask them why you've been punished, if you truly don't know why, and maybe tell them that you think your account has been compromised.
It happened AGAIN? WHAT THE HECK?
